text:
en you snore or make gasping or choking sounds during sleep. Often you're not aware of such symptoms and must ask a family member or bed partner to report them.
                
Let your doctor know if anyone in your family has been diagnosed with sleep apnea or has had symptoms of the disorder.
                
Many people aren't aware of their symptoms and aren't diagnosed.
                
If you're a parent of a child who may have sleep apnea, tell your child's doctor about your child's sign
